channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Naomi is stressing out about running her first kids party at the leisure centre, and Danny and Mick aren?t helping ? especially after they accidently make Walter Whizz the party entertainer 'magically vanish'. With a host of kids desperate for a pirate party, there is only one thing for it - boys and girls, please welcome Captain Danny the Pirate Magician and his lovely assistant Mick.
